creator: asanc@cqc.ictnet.es
text:
The "java" core task does not pass the arguments specified in
a nested "arg" element to the executing class.

I have to resort to the "args" argument of the "java" element. It 
works but then I receive a deprecation warning.

creator: jakarta@ehatchersolutions.com
text:
Could you provide an example of this?  I use <jave> with nested <arg> elements
all the time and it works fine.

creator: sbailliez@apache.org
text:
<project default="main" basedir=".">
<target name="main">
  <java classname="org.apache.tools.ant.Main">
    <arg value="-f"/>
    <arg value="${ant.file}"/>
  </java>
</target>
</project>

Works just fine for me.
